product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
This vibrant promotional banner features a playful theme centered around a toy cat playset. The background consists of soft pastel layers and semi-transparent abstract shapes like peaches, mint green circles, and lavender waves, which give a lively and dreamy effect. Decorative dotted patterns in pink and blue accent the corners for added visual interest. The text layer labeled “heading” appears at the top in a bold, playful font in deep violet, while the “subheading” just below it is styled in compact bold lettering in a rich purple tone. The product image “product_image” is centrally positioned, visually anchoring the design. Below the product image is the prominently placed “price” text, large and attention-grabbing in purple. A bright pink rectangular “cta_button” sits beneath the price, with the call-to-action text “cta” in white, reinforcing immediacy and directing user action.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Pink: `#F4E1F5`
- Accent Pink: `#FF69B4`
- Deep Purple: `#8E44AD`
- Rich Lavender: `#6C3483`
- Mint Green: `#98D8C8`
- Light Coral: `#FFB6C1`
- Highlight Blue: `#5DADE2`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a playful cat-themed toy scene that utilizes a vibrant and whimsical color palette. Dominant colors include bubblegum pink (#F75CA9), mint green (#3CC88F), sand beige (#EDD0A9), sea blue (#49C5CA), lavender purple (#BFA2E1), chestnut brown (#964C1F), and soft white (#F2F2F2). These colors are used to distinguish interactive elements and characters while maintaining visual harmony. The pink treehouse pops against the serene mint and sand background, with accessories in contrasting shades like aqua and violet. Colors blend smoothly through complementary tones but maintain presence through saturation and brightness, creating a cheerful, child-friendly visual aesthetic perfect for an ad banner.
